bib.title: Preparing the future: The HYPXIM mission
bib.citation: Proceedings of the 36th EARSeL Symposium, Bonn, Germany, 20-24, 2016
bib.author: Marie-José Lefèvre-Fonollosa and T Bajouk and X Briottet and V Carrère and C Delacourt and J Feret and J Gastellu-Etchegorry and C Gomez and S Jacquemoud and N Le Dantec and R Marion and T Petit and C Weber
bib.journal: Proceedings of the 36th EARSeL Symposium, Bonn, Germany
bib.abstract: ■ After 2 preliminary studies (ie phase 0) conducted by CNES and its institutional and industrial partners (2009-2010/2011-2012), A phase A based on a very performant instrument took place mid-2012 but was frozen in early 2013 for financial reasons. An option of demonstrator was also considered in 2015, studying the interest of very low orbits (VLEO).
